DiaColloDB::Compat::v0_08 - DiaColloDB utilities: compatibility modules: v0.08.x

##========================================================================
## DESCRIPTION
=pod

=head1 DESCRIPTION

DiaColloDB::Compat::v0_08
is a convenience package for
limited (read-only) backwards-compatible access to
DiaColloDB file formats E<lt>= v0.08.x.

=cut

##----------------------------------------------------------------
## DESCRIPTION: DiaColloDB::Compat::v0_08: Globals
=pod

inherits from
L<DiaColloDB::Compat>.

=back

=cut
